newsitem.title: UKRAINE: Ukraine August industrial production down 1.2 pct.
newsitem.headline: Ukraine August industrial production down 1.2 pct.

text.p: Industrial production in Ukraine declined by 1.2 percent in August compared to the previous month, the Statistics Ministry said on Tuesday.
UKRAINE INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION August96 July96 August95

Ukrainian industrial output has declined every month this year except in March, when it rose 9.5 percent over February levels. The steepest plunge was in January, when the figure was 10.1 percent lower than in December 1995.
The overall decline in production since the beginning of the year is 14.4 percent.
